pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:7.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:7.2: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī saṃsaṭṭhā viharissati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:7.3: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:7.6: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharissati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:7.7: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:7.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:8.2: ‘māyye, saṃsaṭṭhā vihari gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi. Viviccāyye; vivekaññeva bhaginiyā saṃgho vaṇṇetī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:8.3: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:8.4: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce paṭinissajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:14.2: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:15.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:15.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:16.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:16.4: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:16.5: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:18.1: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:18.2: khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:20.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:20.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:20.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
